examples.example: 奶奶在园子里种了好多西葫芦，它们长得可好了。

translate.english: Grandma planted a lot of zucchinis in the garden and they grow very well.

examples.example: 妈妈今天做了美味的西葫芦炒肉片，我吃得津津有味。

translate.english: Mother cooked delicious fried pork slices with zucchini today, and I ate it with relish.

examples.example: 我去菜市场买了新鲜的西葫芦，准备回家做一顿美味的菜肴。

translate.english: I went to the vegetable market to buy fresh zucchini and prepared to go home to make a delicious dish.
